Name: Klym
About the game: Klym is a warm 3D-platformer about climbing buildings and bringing ducklings back to their mother. Features 10-30 minutes of playtime. A small warm town to explore. Grab ledges to climb tall buildings. 4 cute ducks to find. Procedural animations. Controls WASD keys to move. Mouse to look around. Hold & drag the left mouse button to prepare a jump, and then release to set off! RIght mouse button to let go of ledge. Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks! Subscribe for 3$ per month at
